byline.contributor: Clifford Krauss reported from Houston and Stanley Reed from London.
byline.original: By CLIFFORD KRAUSS and STANLEY REED

abstract: Iranian government reportedly calls for 500,000-barrel-per-day increase in oil production, move that could send prices down even further.
lead_paragraph: Iran is reportedly ready to increase its output by 500,000 barrels a day, but some analysts doubt the country can deliver that level of production.

headline.main: Iran Set to Pump More Oil Into Market Glut
headline.print_headline: Iran Set to Pump More Oil Into Market Glut

snippet: Iran is reportedly ready to increase its output by 500,000 barrels a day, but some analysts doubt the country can deliver that level of production.

keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
